OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord ECOG performance status ( 0 1 v 2 3 ) , need opioid analgesic within past 2 week ( yes v ) , weight loss percentage baseline body weight ( < 5 % v ≥ 5 % ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive oral celecoxib twice daily . - Arm II : Patients receive oral placebo twice daily .
